title: Quarkus 2.15.2.Final released - Maintenance release
content: The Quarkus team wishes you a happy new year, and with the new year comes a new Quarkus release, 2.15.2.Final. This version contains bugfixes and documentation improvements for our 2.15 release train. It is a recommended upgrade for anyone already using 2.15. If you are not already using 2.15, please...
